## Community Contribution Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows TNFR style guidelines (English naming, NumPy docstrings)
- [ ] All new code has appropriate docstrings
- [ ] Type hints included for public APIs
- [ ] No breaking changes to existing APIs

### Pattern Validation (if applicable)
- [ ] All patterns validated with `validate_sequence_with_health()`
- [ ] All patterns achieve health score ≥ 0.75
- [ ] Minimum 3 example sequences per pattern
- [ ] Real-world use cases documented
- [ ] Structural insights provided

### Extension Quality (if applicable)
- [ ] Extension validated with `tools/community/extension_validator.py`
- [ ] Overall validation score ≥ 0.75
- [ ] All patterns meet health requirements
- [ ] Extension metadata complete
- [ ] Domain name follows conventions

### Testing
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] Extension validator passes (if applicable)
- [ ] Manual testing performed

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation complete
- [ ] Examples provided for new features
- [ ] CHANGELOG entry added
